title: Bug 11863: Update Test Suite action does not allow to remove
OB: When performing the Update Test Suite action, there is no option to remove certain items. It is unclear that selecting 'Y' in the dialog will result in the removal of item 'X'.
EB: Normally, the 'Update' action should display the existing content (directory or zip file) and allow for modifications. To address this issue, I suggest renaming the action, as well as the dialog, to 'Recreate Test Suite' to clarify the functionality.
